articles.title: Atheist Krishna, Whose Memes Made PM Modi Smile, Dies Of Pneumonia
articles.description: Krishna, renowned for his talent in revitalizing old photographs and his witty humor that resonated widely, passed away due to pneumonia.

articles.title: Tirupati Board Opens New Srivani Darshan Ticket To Ease Devotee Wait Time
articles.description: The Tirumala Tirupati Devasthanams inaugurated a new SRIVANI Darshan Ticket Centre to reduce waiting times for devotees.

articles.title: "F*** Off, Indian": Man Brutally Assaulted, Racially Abused In Australia
articles.description: An Indian man was allegedly assaulted and racially abused by unidentified individuals during a parking dispute in Adelaide.
